pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# unitauto-py UnitAuto Python 库，可通过 pip 仓库等远程依赖。
UnitAuto Python Library for remote dependencies with pip, etc.#### 1. 在你的项目中添加依赖#### 1. Add dependency to your project```shpip install unitauto```如果执行以上命令未成功，则将 pip 换成 pip3 试试：
if you cannot run the command successfully, try pip3:```shpip3 install unitauto```
#### 2. 运行 main.py#### 2. Run main.py```shpython main.py```如果执行以上命令未成功，则将 python 换成 python3 试试：
if you cannot run the command successfully, try python3:```shpython3 main.py```
#### 3. 参考主项目文档来测试#### 3. Test by following the main repohttps://github.com/TommyLemon/UnitAuto
